review: Takes a few min. TO set up . Works great.
author: Steven Jacobs

review: I LOVE THIS... ORDERED ONE FOR EVERY TV IN MY HOUSE!!
author: karen j townsend

review: Easy to install, no issues, easy to navigate. Now I can watch Amazon or netflix in my bedroom instead of on my nook
author: Sandy H

review: Works great good pic good signal from a distanceI got for $19 but it's worth $39
author: Elements "morbid"

review: Works very well and easy to set up.
author: Joseph Phelps

review: The fire stick is perfect for someone who wants to access other applications and doesn't want a blu ray wifi dvd player taking up space.  Great purchase.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent. Same as the fire tv box I have except only $39.
author: Gerry Kulig

review: What a fabulous product. So easy to use....pretty much just plug & play! Highly recommend!
author: Tina Perrone

review: Have really enjoyed being able to switch over to Amazon on my TV.  I have Amazon now on a new smart TV and the Fire TV Stick is much faster than the smart TV.  Been great it seems to update on its own, or when I don't notice.
author: J. Lyle Martin
